title: Chronosquad
body:
Currently looking for a CHRONOSQUAD TEAM! IDC what your rank is so long as it is +Bronze 3. I am Bronze 1. The composition I want for the team is:
Zilean - Mid (Me)
Ekko - Top (NOTE: You must be competent with Ekko)
Hecarim - Jungle
ADC/Supp: Open. I might go supp Zildude occasionally.
Also, if you're toxic or generally a pain in the ass to play with, you're going to get dropped.
